tool_description: Tracks and updates donor communication preferences based on engagement patterns, opt-out requests, and interaction feedback to optimize future outreach.

interaction_data.description: Recent interaction types: email_open, email_click, unsubscribe, donation, event_attendance, phone_response

update_preferences.description: Whether to automatically update donor preferences based on interactions

error_messages: Donor not found: The specified donor_id does not exist in the database.
Invalid interaction type: One or more items in interaction_data are not recognized interaction types.
Insufficient data: Need at least one valid interaction to update preferences.
Data conflict: Conflicting interaction signals prevent clear preference determination.
usage: Provide donor_id and interaction_data array containing recent donor interactions. Optionally disable automatic preference updates. Returns updated preference profile and recommendations.

preferences_updated.description: Whether donor preferences were successfully updated

preferred_channels.description: Donor's preferred communication channels based on engagement

last_interaction.description: Most recent interaction type and date

recommendations.description: Recommendations for future communication with this donor
